author: gsm1091

text: Know what this game had (that made it such a better game btw) which others didn't? When you won the game, there was still tons more to do. I wish every one of those too-easy games, and even the games that are really good, had a reason for you to keep playing, even after you won. Like Chrono Trigger, for example. And, even once you found everything, there needs to be a secret area that you can get addicted to, like in Kirby Superstar Ultra, the Helper to Hero arena. (Still playing it today :3)

text: Well this one's a classic. As much as I loved the Galaxy series, I'd like a new 3D Mario game inspired by this game. The Galaxy games are constant rollercoasters of fun but I really enjoyed this game's more open worlds where you ended up basically knowing them like the back of your hand. I can't wait to see where the next 3D Mario on the Wii U will be heading. Super Mario Universe ?
